function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to lack of safety measures in construction sites.","Impact":"Potential widespread outbreak among employees and economic uncertainty.","Mitigation":"Implement safety protocols, provide PPE, and promote employee wellbeing.","Technologies":"Videoconferencing, sensors, CCTV, and remote communication tools.","People":"Construction site employees and workers.","Owner":"Construction organizations and management."},{"Description":"Challenges in maintaining regular communication and coordination among project teams due to social distancing measures.","Impact":"Potential decline in productivity and lack of effective collaboration.","Mitigation":"Encourage and adopt new modes of communication such as videoconferencing and innovative remote communication tools.","Technologies":"Hardhat-mounted headsets, videoconferencing, sensors, and CCTV.","People":"Project teams and construction site employees.","Owner":"Construction organizations and management."},{"Description":"Risk of late or halted deliveries of materials from suppliers, impacting project timelines and progress.","Impact":"Delays in construction projects, increased costs, and potential resource shortages.","Mitigation":"Assess possibility of procurement procedure changes, consider local suppliers, and ensure availability of labor, equipment, and materials.","Technologies":"Procurement management tools and local supplier databases.","People":"Procurement teams, suppliers, and construction project managers.","Owner":"Construction organizations and procurement management."}]}
